title: World of Wonders: In Praise of Fireflies, Whale Sharks, and Other Astonishments
description: "From beloved, award-winning poet Aimee Nezhukumatathil comes a debut work of nonfiction-a collection of essays about the natural world, and the way its inhabitants can teach, support, and inspire us"--
author: Aimee Nezhukumatathil
